course.title: Next.JS with Sanity CMS - Serverless Blog App (w/ Vercel)
course.description: Build your own Blog App with the latest Next.JS & React(Next 9.4+, React hooks). Learn how to use headless Sanity CMS.
course.author: Filip Jerga
wsl: Use the latest Next/React features (getStaticProps, getStaticPaths, getServerSideProps)
